leads.lead_text: Culms pubescent immediately below inflorescence, otherwise glabrous; spikes often rather sparse; glumes widely gaping or reflexed at maturity; rocky country in the far east
Culms covered to base with short spreading hairs; spikes dense; glumes not widely gaping or reflexed at maturity; alpine
